I feel like: Make sure you leve one star or RT will not count your review...I made an account just to leave a review on how bad this was\, As a point I have to say Im a fan of the books so im a little biased because I know what a relatively good continuation looked like BUT when they nixed cannon I still had hopes but my god\, they must just throw darts at sticky notes to put these movies together now. The political undertones of the movie are annoying for anyone above skill level one comprehension\, just tell a goddamn space war story\, the marketing towards kids excuse is hilarious\, as if just shredding a 35 plus year story wouldnt warrant backlash (math pro tip\, there are more \"older\" fans then \"young fans\"). This shit was a slap in the face which is whatever\, its Disneys movie now but they cant sit around and wonder why everyone hates it when they put out a shit product.
